article: you know , as many days now , i realise that i was stucked in the infinitive dimension without acknowledging what is happening . at that time i still so very naive , do n't know what will come to me , and how suprisingly it takes . there was the most terrible moment that i have passed , i could n't find any motivation for my life , and also being a bad stuff in parent 's eye . you know what really mean . for the time you do n't set your chance , you will be get back behind and it was right to me .

i have been hesitant to talk to my mom about all my purposes , my dream and also my conduction , and that ` s why i was lost eventually in fighting with `` fox `` inside my conciousness . there was resulted that i became the spineless guy , which nobody interested in , and furthermore i forgot who i was , how i lived and why i lived . that ` s ridiculous , right ? may be you wonder that guy still existed on the earth . the answer is yes . share the same meaning , which made me , or i just said i did n't want to do anything i hated so that i was lost in the spacious infinity which no one can help .

honestly , i was very tired to hear many things like marks , points of even involving to the department of education , what a luxurious brand , those give lots of student in the rush , and change whenever they want . as my mom has said that `` your last semester ` s studying was very bad , i want you to try at the next semester `` , at the first time , i only think simply as the good encouragement from her and how kind she was . but in the suspicious hapiness , the recognition appeared in my mind , and i wonder if she ignored all of my efforts and criticized me as she used to do .

and you know what happened next , i was very angry , and i shouted at her , just only one little moment i could n't keep up my emotion . however , i was silent then because i awared that i had done a terrible things as i did n't expect to be , that ` s she is my mom and i have made she been upset for many times without any apology . if only i have told her the way i will go , the thing i want to be , the dream , so now i may not tell her those bad stuffs .

and one more thing , i think i walk so very far to fail because till now i have n't made any experience for my life , only be jealous with other guys , demanding self-development without acting , and i was distracted easily with many interesting stuffs without concentrating in one area . in total , experiencing with my respects , i just only a loser in all field , not much not less . thanks for your reading ! -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- - kanal z -- -- -- -- -- -- -- .
